short_summary: Supply and delivery of galvanized coating to steel components
description: Supply and delivery of galvanized coating to general steel components, structural sections, fabricated steel assemblies, threaded fasteners and dock frames.\n\nThe work will involve offloading components from Parks Canada trailer, cleaning, hot dip galvanizing, storage while curing and the re-loading finished product to Parks Canada Truck/Trailer in a safe manner and in accordance with the requests of our driver.

_____________________

Tender Notice
Title: Application of Galvanized Coating to Steel Components - Trent Severn Waterways NHSC
RFSA Publication No: 5P300-22-0363/A
Closing Date: [Actual Date] by 2:00 PM (ET)

**Solictation Details**

* RFSOA Reference No: PW-23-01029626
* Solicitation No: 5P300-22-0363/A
* Publication Date: 2023-03-14
* Amendment Date: 2023-03-22

**Delivery and Work Requirements**

The successful contractor will be responsible for the application of galvanized coating to general steel components, structural sections, fabricated steel assemblies, threaded fasteners, and dock frames at the Trent Severn Waterways National Historic Site. The specifications of the largest dock size in this project is 10 feet by 18.5 feet by 3 feet. The contractor must adhere to the necessary safety procedures and regulations in the handling and storage of the materials.

**Standing Offer Purchase Period**

The proposed standing offer purchase period is from July 1, 2023, to June 30, 2024. The Business Offeror must agree to extend the period of the Standing Offer for 3 additional periods, namely, from July 1, 2024 to June 30, 2025, July 1, 2025 to June 30, 2026, and July 1, 2026 to June 30, 2027, at the same conditions and at the specified rate or price.

**Reqest for Bids**

Bidders are required to submit their bids by fax or email to soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca, which is the only acceptable email address for response to the Request for Standing Offers (RFSO). Offers must conform to the requirements of the solicitation documents and business register number in accordance with Government procurement contracts and Agency policies.

**Subission Instructions**

The Crown intends to accept submissions by email as the Sole authorized medium of bid receipt. The maximum size of the email that Parks Canada's system is able to receive is 15 megabytes (MB). Bidders must take note that emails sent that are too large to receive may be resubmitted in multiple emails, splitting attachments if necessary.

**Respnses to RFOs**

Any objections or concerns regarding this RFO must be communicated through the email address soumissionsest-bidseast
